amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds to enter into contracts with entities that engage in discriminatory profiling based on gender, race, ethnicity, religion, sexual orientation, or national origin.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enter into a contract with any person whose disclosures of a proceeding with a disposition listed in section 2313(c)(1) of title 41, United States Code, in the Federal Awardee Performance and Integrity Information System include the term "Fair Labor Standards Act".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A056) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 244 (Roll no. 281).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A056) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 244 (Roll no. 281).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A056) offered by Mr. Ellison.
